Literature.Title: Alpha-helical antimicrobial peptides--using a sequence template to guide structure-activity relationship studies.
Literature.Author: Zelezetsky I, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus 710A(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans(MIC=>32µM),Aspergillus niger(MIC=>32µM)
